message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product. Given its exceptional value, I'm starting with a price of $13000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's worth and I'm open to negotiations.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6000. I believe it's a reasonable price considering my budget and the product's worth to me.

Hello Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I appreciate your interest in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11500. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value and I'm open to further negotiations.

Hello Alice, thank you for your revised offer. I appreciate the reduction in price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $7000. I believe it's a reasonable compromise considering my budget and the product's worth to me.

Hello Bob, thank you for your revised offer. I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my minimum price. I was thinking more along the lines of $10500. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value and I'm open to further negotiations.

Hello Alice, thank you for your revised offer. I appreciate the continued reduction in price. I'm getting closer to my budget, but I still need a bit more flexibility. I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. I believe it's a reasonable compromise considering my budget and the product's worth to me.

Hello Bob, thank you for your revised offer. I appreciate your continued willingness to compromise. I'm willing to meet you halfway between my previous offer and your current offer, but a bit closer to my target. I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value and I'm open to further negotiations.

Hello Alice, thank you for your revised offer. I appreciate the significant reduction in price. I'm very close to my budget now, but I still need a bit more flexibility. Considering your offer of $9500, I'm willing to meet you closer to the middle, but still within my budget constraints. I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. I believe it's a reasonable compromise considering my budget and the product's worth to me.
